Merchant.definition: a person who trades in goods esp. of a certain kind and possesses expertise in the area of the goods and the practices of trading in them or who employs others with such expertise [a warranty that the goods shall be merchantable is implied in a contract for their sale if the seller is a with respect to goods of that kind " Uniform Commercial Code "]
